title: A Few Almonds Forever
description: A Few Almonds Forever - Rohit, a software engineer who dreams of travelling and writing. He wants to quit his job to follow his passion. Garima, a happy-go-lucky college student who falls in love with a boy whose heart is stolen by a female colleague in the office. Naina, a software engineer who is in love with a boy, but she is engaged to someone else. Atul and Pooja, the two are in love with each other, but their parents don't agree. Will they make it? Or destiny has stored something else for them. Explore how life put their love to the ultimate test. This story will stay with you long after you have turned the final page.
author: Brijesh Sharma
